title: Sedona Chamber of Commerce
description: Official site of the Sedona Chamber of Commerce. Find the best places to stay, eat, and relax in Arizona's famous Red Rock country.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Healing Itinerary Experience the healing properties of the Sedona region. Spiritual Healing Experience Day 1: Visit the [Chapel of the Holy Cross](http://www.chapeloftheholycross.com/) Take a [Jeep Tour to Vortex Sites](https://visitsedona.com/things-to-do/tours-sightseeing/jeep-trolley-tours/) Visit [metaphysical shops](https://visitsedona.com/shopping/new-age-metaphysical/) Day 2: Take a hike to a [Vortex Site](https://visitsedona.com/spiritual-wellness/what-is-a-vortex/) Visit the [Amitabha stupa](https://www.tara.org/stupas/sedona-arizona/) Participate in [Healing Programs](https://visitsedona.com/spiritual-wellness/healing-therapies/) - Aromatherapy - Sound Healing - Breathing Session - Hands on Healing - Energy Work - Chakra Balancing - Reiki, etc. Day 3: [Pamper Your Body and Soul](https://visitsedona.com/spiritual-wellness/spas-salons/) at a Spa and/or [Experience Spiritual Readings](https://visitsedona.com/spiritual-wellness/readings-psychics/) - Hot Stone Therapy - Pain Management - Reflexology - Massage, etc. - Tarot Card Reading - Intuitive Reading - Aura Reading - Astrology, etc. Other
